title: Selecting champion error
body: So this has happend multiple times to me where i'm in champ select and the clients lags and i'm spamming the lock in button and then it gives me a message saying "There was a problem selecting your champion please try again" making me doge and giving me a timer. Is there something i can do to fix this, because it's getting realllllly annoying. Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: I have the same issue...I think it is the game client that is unstable ...not the internet.  Someone needs to do more work regarding their coding in this area.

Sorry that happened to you.  :(  This can happen for a few reasons, though.  Firstly, I recommend enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode just in case champion select is causing too much stress on your pc.

This can also happen if your connection is degrading or unstable, which can cause you to lose sync or get left behind.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot that.

Be sure to test it in a custom game, though, to prevent anymore penalties.  I hope that helps!
